# Apply SCAMPER Technique to Innovation

## Purpose
Use SCAMPER framework (Substitute, Combine, Adapt, Modify, Put to other uses, Eliminate, Reverse) for systematic innovation.

## When to Use
When improving existing products or features through structured creative thinking.

## Related Agent
[@creative-brainstorming]

## Expected Outcome
Innovation ideas generated through each SCAMPER dimension with implementation potential.
